channel.title: Attack delay and spec delay need help
channel.description: okay ive been trying for a while to look for it but i cant find it. When you click a monster to attack it takes about 3 seconds to attack witch is a delay attack. Then when you click special it takes about 3 seconds to turn spec on so right when u switch or use spec u gota click spec right then and there for it to spec in time. How do i fix this if u need more info just ask cause i can try to give more. ty

item.title: Attack delay and spec delay need help
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

okay ive been trying for a while to look for it but i cant find it. When you click a monster to attack it takes about 3 seconds to attack witch is a delay attack. Then when you click special it takes about 3 seconds to turn spec on so right when u switch or use spec u gota click spec right then and there for it to spec in time. How do i fix this if u need more info just ask cause i can try to give more. ty
